set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logType":"Error: ", "code": 404, "message": "Page Not Found", "errorType": "HTTP:NOT_FOUND", "dateTime": now(), "description": "Error common project", "source": "" }]
set-variable.doc:name: ERROR_MESSAGE Error common project

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logType":"Error: ", "code": 400, "message": "Bad Request", "errorType": "BAD_REQUEST", "dateTime": now(), "description": "Error log-mail-connector ", "source": "Common project" }]
set-variable.doc:name: Variable Error mail connector

set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/dw --- ( (vars.ERROR_MESSAGE."logType" default "ERROR: ") ++ (vars.ERROR_MESSAGE."description" default " " ) ++ "." ++ (vars.ERROR_MESSAGE."source" default " " ) ++ ". Error details: {" ++ (vars.ERROR_MESSAGE."message" default " ") ++ "," ++ (vars.ERROR_MESSAGE."code" default 500) ++ "}" )]
set-variable.doc:name: Set Variable errorLog
